comment.author: 39967544@N00
comment._content: The White Star Line built the Ceramic in 1913, a giant liner then for the Australian service. It is shown here berthed in Darling Harbour in Sydney. It was torpedoed in 1942.

comment.author: 49015875@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Ceramic_%281913%29 sunk with a loss of over 600 lives
